channel.title: Jacobr tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from Jacobr.

item.description: @healthbjk As a life-long Red Sox fan - I'm gonna stick with XML. True fans never give up. Also kinda rooting for underdogs like MQTT and YAML in the offseason.
item.source:markdown: @healthbjk As a life-long Red Sox fan - I'm gonna stick with XML. True fans never give up. Also kinda rooting for underdogs like MQTT and YAML in the offseason.

item.description: @Farzad_MD Confirmed. Dinner with a PCP recently (who joined an ACO - not ours (and not yours) during the ACO frenzy of 2022) ... "yeh - this thing is amazing. I sign up all of my patients, and the revenue just flows. So great." (not)
item.source:markdown: @Farzad_MD Confirmed. Dinner with a PCP recently (who joined an ACO - not ours (and not yours) during the ACO frenzy of 2022) ... "yeh - this thing is amazing. I sign up all of my patients, and the revenue just flows. So great." (not)
